short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that saves gifts to your Gifty wishlists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gifty is an app for keeping track of what you, your friends, and your family have on their wishlists. 

Click on the gifty extension and save whatever product you're looking at on your browser. That item will now appear in your wishlist in the app!
